org.fluentjava.closures
Class InvocationHandlerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.fluentjava.closures.InvocationHandlerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
public class InvocationHandlerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler

Adaptas a closure to a Invocation Handler. Essentily it ignores the proxy and the method called, and just forwards args to Closure.call. Only forwards method of the adpated interface.
